messages.title: 5 MORE REASONS TO VOTE MOYIES
messages.content: He will fight for Southend jobs, for proper rail and road infrastructure, to stop mass immigration which means 22,000 more homes in the Southend area, to introduce fair pensions, benefits & welfare, for local democracy through local votes.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight for proper rail and road infrastructure
Stop mass immigration which means 22,000 more homes in the Southend area
Fight for local democracy through local votes

issues.economy: Jobs have been lost even during the boom years.
issues.environment: Our roads are congested and our trains are slower than 20 years ago.
issues.immigration: Stop mass immigration which means 22,000 more homes in the Southend area

housing.content: We are being forced to build 22,000 houses for people who mostly do not currently live in our country.

leaflet.personalStatement: If elected to represent you in the new Westminster Parliament I will use all my energy to improve our town. We have too many agencies involved in planning the townâ€™s future. Our transport is poor. Our roads are congested and our trains are slower than 20 years ago. It will get worse... Meanwhile, Southend Council are Paying millions every year to private landlords. Jobs have been lost even during the boom years. My goals will be Independence for our country & Jobs and homes for Southend people.

contactInformation.address: Printed by Circle Services Group, 7 Stock Rd, Southend, Essex SS2 5QF. Promoted and published by James Moyies, 9 Malmmsmead, Shoeburyness, Essex SS3 8AZ
